pages.text: The $(mob)Witch$() is a monster that spawns in Roofed Forests on the surface in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It is immune to $(thing)Poison$() and $(thing)Harming$() potion effects. $(mob)Witches$() attack players on sight with a  ranged potion effect attack similar to the illager $(l:minecraft_witch)$(mob)Witch$(). In combat, it can spawn up to 1 $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeleton$() and 1 $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombie$(), also granting summoned $(mob)Skeletons$() a $(thing)Resistance$() effect.
$(mob)Witches$() rarely drop $(item)Mandragora Pot$() on death, which is a decorative block representing the $(mob)Mandragora$().
$(mob)Witches$() rarely drop $(item)Book of Memory$() which can be used to gain 10 experience levels.
